# juju_jaas_group (Resource)

A resource that represents a group in JAAS

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "juju_jaas_group" "development" {
  name = "devops-team"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the group

### Read-Only

- `uuid` (String) UUID of the group
